description.player: An evolution of Rune Breaker. You can now unravel complex, powerful, and permanent magical arrays with a touch.

description.player: You don't just cancel a spell; you consume it, drawing its power into the Void. This move allows you to automatically negate a single spell targeted at you.

description.short: Your body is partially phased with the Void. You gain a universal armor value against ALL forms of damage as a portion of all incoming energy simply ceases to exist upon contact.
description.player: Your body is partially phased with the Void. You gain a universal armor value against ALL forms of damage as a portion of all incoming energy simply ceases to exist upon contact.

description.short: Your existence is a lit fuse. Every time you channel the ultimate power of the Void, a piece of your own existence is permanently erased. You have a finite number of uses of your Void Blade ability before your own soul is completely negated.
description.player: Your existence is a lit fuse. Every time you channel the ultimate power of the Void, a piece of your own existence is permanently erased. You have a finite number of uses of your Void Blade ability before your own soul is completely negated.

description.short: As an action, you can summon a blade of pure, shimmering nothingness for a single strike. This attack automatically hits and cannot be blocked, parried, or soaked by any armor, magical or mundane.
description.player: As an action, you can summon a blade of pure, shimmering nothingness for a single strike. This attack automatically hits and cannot be blocked, parried, or soaked by any armor, magical or mundane.

description.short: You can automatically sense the presence and general direction of any significant, free-willed supernatural entity in your immediate vicinity. This does not allow you to see the entity or know its specific nature, only that something powerful and 'other' is nearby.
description.player: You can automatically sense the presence and general direction of any significant, free-willed supernatural entity in your immediate vicinity. This does not allow you to see the entity or know its specific nature, only that something powerful and 'other' is nearby.

description.short: You can focus on a specific location or object, opening your mind to the psychic residue left behind by moments of intense emotion. On a 10+, you receive a clear sensory flash. On a 7-9, the echo is fragmented. On a 6-, you connect to a meaningless echo.
description.player: You can focus on a specific location or object, opening your mind to the psychic residue left behind by moments of intense emotion. On a 10+, you receive a clear sensory flash. On a 7-9, the echo is fragmented. On a 6-, you connect to a meaningless echo.

description.short: You can give form and purpose to the simplest of 'spirits'—the Sprites. At character creation, you define three types of Sprites you are attuned to, each with a single, simple function (e.g., Messenger, Warden, Spark). As an action, you can summon one of your known Sprites to perform its function.

description.short: Designate one of your Sprites as your 'Bonded Sprite.' This Sprite is now a permanent companion, is more intelligent, and can follow more complex commands.
description.player: Designate one of your Sprites as your 'Bonded Sprite.' This Sprite is now a permanent companion, is more intelligent, and can follow more complex commands.

description.short: On a 10+, temporarily imbue a simple, mundane object with an animating spirit that will follow one simple, ongoing command for the scene. On a 7-9, the animation is flawed.
description.player: On a 10+, temporarily imbue a simple, mundane object with an animating spirit that will follow one simple, ongoing command for the scene. On a 7-9, the animation is flawed.

description.short: You can now imbue your animated servants with simple IF-THEN logic.
description.player: You can now imbue your animated servants with simple IF-THEN logic.

description.short: You project your consciousness into one of your active animated constructs, seeing through its 'eyes' and controlling its every move directly. Your physical body remains behind, unconscious and vulnerable.
description.player: You project your consciousness into one of your active animated constructs, seeing through its 'eyes' and controlling its every move directly. Your physical body remains behind, unconscious and vulnerable.

description.short: You flood your construct with an overwhelming amount of your own mental energy, pushing its physical form past its design limits for a short burst of incredible performance. At the end of the effect, the construct suffers significant, lasting damage.
description.player: You flood your construct with an overwhelming amount of your own mental energy, pushing its physical form past its design limits for a short burst of incredible performance. At the end of the effect, the construct suffers significant, lasting damage.

description.short: Through your work with constructs, you have gained an intuitive, profound understanding of mechanics and engineering. You are considered to have an Expert (+1) skill rank in Engineering.
description.player: Through your work with constructs, you have gained an intuitive, profound understanding of mechanics and engineering. You are considered to have an Expert (+1) skill rank in Engineering.

description.short: You can split your consciousness, animating and directing a number of simple constructs (up to your Presence attribute) simultaneously with the same simple, conditional command.
description.player: You can split your consciousness, animating and directing a number of simple constructs (up to your Presence attribute) simultaneously with the same simple, conditional command.

description.short: Your horde of puppets acts with uncanny coordination, relaying sensor data to each other and working together on complex tasks without your direct input.
description.player: Your horde of puppets acts with uncanny coordination, relaying sensor data to each other and working together on complex tasks without your direct input.

description.short: During Downtime, you can modify your inanimate puppets for specific roles (e.g., a 'bearer' to carry heavy loads, a 'hitter' with weighted clubs).
description.player: During Downtime, you can modify your inanimate puppets for specific roles (e.g., a 'bearer' to carry heavy loads, a 'hitter' with weighted clubs).

description.short: Your Spirit Sense is now attuned to the specific resonance of death. You can automatically sense the location and number of any intact dead bodies within a significant radius.
description.player: Your Spirit Sense is now attuned to the specific resonance of death. You can automatically sense the location and number of any intact dead bodies within a significant radius.

description.short: An evolution of Master of Puppets, this allows you to raise and command a large number of undead servants at once.
description.player: An evolution of Master of Puppets, this allows you to raise and command a large number of undead servants at once.

description.short: Your horde acts as a single, coordinated entity. You can give them complex conditional commands, and they will execute them with mindless, relentless efficiency.
description.player: Your horde acts as a single, coordinated entity. You can give them complex conditional commands, and they will execute them with mindless, relentless efficiency.

description.short: Initiate a formal, binding negotiation with a spirit to create a contract. The negotiation itself is a roleplaying scene. If a pact is agreed upon, its terms are magically binding.
description.player: Initiate a formal, binding negotiation with a spirit to create a contract. The negotiation itself is a roleplaying scene. If a pact is agreed upon, its terms are magically binding.

description.player: Your Aether-organ acts as a universal translator for spiritual consciousness, allowing for clearer communication. You have an advantage on all rolls made to negotiate with or understand a spiritual entity.

description.short: You open your body as a temporary vessel, allowing a spirit you have a connection with to speak and perceive through you for a scene. You remain in control, but the spirit's presence can be mentally taxing.
description.player: You open your body as a temporary vessel, allowing a spirit you have a connection with to speak and perceive through you for a scene. You remain in control, but the spirit's presence can be mentally taxing.

description.short: You forge a permanent, symbiotic bond with a single, specific spirit, who becomes your patron.
description.player: You forge a permanent, symbiotic bond with a single, specific spirit, who becomes your patron.

description.short: Your patron spirit grants you a permanent passive benefit related to its nature (e.g., a fire spirit might grant you resistance to heat; a spirit of knowledge might give you a bonus to Lore rolls). This is defined with the GM.
description.player: Your patron spirit grants you a permanent passive benefit related to its nature (e.g., a fire spirit might grant you resistance to heat; a spirit of knowledge might give you a bonus to Lore rolls). This is defined with the GM.

description.player: You can allow your patron spirit to partially merge with you for a scene, granting you access to one of its minor powers or skills.

description.short: You can create a temporary 'fence' of Aether in an area that a specific spirit or type of spirit cannot cross.
description.player: You can create a temporary 'fence' of Aether in an area that a specific spirit or type of spirit cannot cross.

description.short: You can perform a ritual to sever a spirit's anchor to the physical world, forcefully ejecting it back into the deep Aether.
description.player: You can perform a ritual to sever a spirit's anchor to the physical world, forcefully ejecting it back into the deep Aether.

description.short: You can use the threat of a Banish or Restrict to force a spirit into an unfavorable Spirit Pact.
description.player: You can use the threat of a Banish or Restrict to force a spirit into an unfavorable Spirit Pact.

description.short: Initiate a formal, binding negotiation with a spirit to convince it to inhabit a vessel you have prepared. If a pact is agreed upon, the spirit is bound to the vessel and your terms.
description.player: Initiate a formal, binding negotiation with a spirit to convince it to inhabit a vessel you have prepared. If a pact is agreed upon, the spirit is bound to the vessel and your terms.

description.short: You perform a ritual over a non-living object during Downtime to make it more appealing and stable for a spirit to inhabit. A prepared vessel makes any Spirit Pact negotiation easier.
description.player: You perform a ritual over a non-living object during Downtime to make it more appealing and stable for a spirit to inhabit. A prepared vessel makes any Spirit Pact negotiation easier.

description.short: You can successfully create vessels for and forge pacts with spirits of a low power tier.
description.player: You can successfully create vessels for and forge pacts with spirits of a low power tier.

description.short: Your reputation precedes you. You gain a permanent bonus to all Social rolls made when negotiating a Spirit Pact.
description.player: Your reputation precedes you. You gain a permanent bonus to all Social rolls made when negotiating a Spirit Pact.

description.short: Your skill has grown immensely. You can now prepare vessels of exquisite quality, capable of containing more powerful and influential spirits of a medium power tier.
description.player: Your skill has grown immensely. You can now prepare vessels of exquisite quality, capable of containing more powerful and influential spirits of a medium power tier.

description.short: You can temporarily attune an area's Aetheric resonance to match that of a specific spirit, granting an advantage on any attempt to summon, negotiate with, or command that spirit within the area.
description.player: You can temporarily attune an area's Aetheric resonance to match that of a specific spirit, granting an advantage on any attempt to summon, negotiate with, or command that spirit within the area.

description.short: You maintain a 'mental Rolodex' of spirits. When a client needs a specific service, you can make a Lore roll to know which spirit in your Index would be the best fit for the job.
description.player: You maintain a 'mental Rolodex' of spirits. When a client needs a specific service, you can make a Lore roll to know which spirit in your Index would be the best fit for the job.

description.short: You can draft a physical or psychic document that, once agreed upon by two or more parties (one must be a spirit), is magically absolute.
description.player: You can draft a physical or psychic document that, once agreed upon by two or more parties (one must be a spirit), is magically absolute.

description.short: As part of the contract, you can weave a minor sympathetic link between the signing parties, allowing them to feel each other's general emotional state or know when the bargain is fulfilled or broken.
description.player: As part of the contract, you can weave a minor sympathetic link between the signing parties, allowing them to feel each other's general emotional state or know when the bargain is fulfilled or broken.

description.short: You can summon a number of Psychomata at once. They are amorphous and their nature is determined by your current emotional state. They are not under your direct control and will act according to their core emotion.
description.player: You can summon a number of Psychomata at once. They are amorphous and their nature is determined by your current emotional state. They are not under your direct control and will act according to their core emotion.

description.short: As an action, you can give a single, one-word command (e.g., 'Attack,' 'Flee,' 'Protect') to all of your active Psychomata. They will obey this command for one round before reverting to their instinctual behavior.
description.player: As an action, you can give a single, one-word command (e.g., 'Attack,' 'Flee,' 'Protect') to all of your active Psychomata. They will obey this command for one round before reverting to their instinctual behavior.

description.short: When your Psychomata are active, the immediate environment changes to reflect the nature of your summoned entity (e.g., fear causes shadows to deepen, joy causes colors to oversaturate). This provides a narrative bonus or penalty to social interactions.
description.player: When your Psychomata are active, the immediate environment changes to reflect the nature of your summoned entity (e.g., fear causes shadows to deepen, joy causes colors to oversaturate). This provides a narrative bonus or penalty to social interactions.

description.player: Your Waking Dream effect is now permanently twisted. The world around you becomes a terrifying tableau of your inner horrors. You gain an advantage on all Intimidation rolls.

description.short: Your nightmares feed on the fear they create. When an enemy is successfully frightened by your summons or your aura, your summons' duration in the physical world is extended.
description.player: Your nightmares feed on the fear they create. When an enemy is successfully frightened by your summons or your aura, your summons' duration in the physical world is extended.

description.short: You have no real control, only leverage. You can make a pact with your nightmares, offering them a chance to indulge their dark appetites in exchange for a specific service.
description.player: You have no real control, only leverage. You can make a pact with your nightmares, offering them a chance to indulge their dark appetites in exchange for a specific service.

description.short: You work with your GM to define the core 'Mythos' of your summons (e.g., The Carnival of Souls, The Clockwork Legion). This defines the aesthetic and hierarchy of all your future summons.

description.short: You can fully open the gates to your inner world, letting your Mythos spill into reality, summoning a large horde of your lesser Mythos creatures at once.
description.player: You can fully open the gates to your inner world, letting your Mythos spill into reality, summoning a large horde of your lesser Mythos creatures at once.

All linked members share a general awareness of each other's location and status. You can send simple, one-sentence commands telepathically to the entire group. All linked members gain a minor bonus (+1) to any roll made as part of a coordinated group action.

description.short: Project your consciousness into a sleeping target's dreams. On a 10+, you have full control. On a 7-9, you are swept along by the dream's narrative or take 1 Temp Corruption. On a 6-, you become trapped until woken, taking 2 Stun.
description.player: Project your consciousness into a sleeping target's dreams. On a 10+, you have full control. On a 7-9, you are swept along by the dream's narrative or take 1 Temp Corruption. On a 6-, you become trapped until woken, taking 2 Stun.

description.short: Open yourself to the dreaming while awake, becoming aware of every mind's state (awake/asleep) locally. The knowledge can be overwhelming.
description.player: Open yourself to the dreaming while awake, becoming aware of every mind's state (awake/asleep) locally. The knowledge can be overwhelming.

description.short: Temporarily boost your mental processing speed for rapid calculation, perfect recall, or hyper-focused problem-solving.
description.player: Temporarily boost your mental processing speed for rapid calculation, perfect recall, or hyper-focused problem-solving.

description.short: For one scene, re-route your sensory input, like 'seeing' with your ears to bypass blindness.
description.player: For one scene, re-route your sensory input, like 'seeing' with your ears to bypass blindness.

description.short: Perfectly observe a physical action or skill. On a 10+, you can perform that action for the scene as if you had an Expert rank. Can be used for impersonation with significant study.
description.player: Perfectly observe a physical action or skill. On a 10+, you can perform that action for the scene as if you had an Expert rank. Can be used for impersonation with significant study.

description.short: For one scene, sever your emotional responses. You are immune to fear and emotional manipulation, but suffer a -2 penalty on social rolls requiring empathy.
description.player: For one scene, sever your emotional responses. You are immune to fear and emotional manipulation, but suffer a -2 penalty on social rolls requiring empathy.

description.short: Enter a 'mind palace'. Describe a complex problem to the GM, who must give you a direct, truthful answer or a significant clue.
description.player: Enter a 'mind palace'. Describe a complex problem to the GM, who must give you a direct, truthful answer or a significant clue.

description.short: The ability to alter, enhance, or suppress your own memories. This is a Deep Surgery move.
description.player: The ability to alter, enhance, or suppress your own memories. This is a Deep Surgery move.

description.short: Re-architect your mind's defenses, granting a +2 bonus when resisting any form of mental intrusion.
description.player: Re-architect your mind's defenses, granting a +2 bonus when resisting any form of mental intrusion.

description.short: Fracture your consciousness into two distinct, switchable personas designed at character creation. This is a Deep Surgery move.
description.player: Fracture your consciousness into two distinct, switchable personas designed at character creation. This is a Deep Surgery move.

description.short: Edit your brain to no longer require sleep. You cannot be rendered unconscious by exhaustion, but you can no longer dream or benefit from a Dreamer's powers.
description.player: Edit your brain to no longer require sleep. You cannot be rendered unconscious by exhaustion, but you can no longer dream or benefit from a Dreamer's powers.
